ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:49:45 [Issue ID 4000-76119] urn:comicvine:4000-76119 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:46:12. [Issue ID 95769]
ComicInfo.Summary: The highly-anticipated seventh issue of the mega-popular CLIFFHANGER book BATTLE CHASERS is upon us -- and what an explosive return it is! Creator/writer and penciller Joe Madureira, along with coplotter/scripter Munier Sharrieff and inker Tim Townsend, brings us another edge-of-your-seat action-packed issue that has Garrison, Calibretto, Knolan, and Gully facing off against a fearsome new opponent, spawned from a place you'd never expect...a fan's mind! That's right, the outrageous monster battled in this issue was designed by an actual BATTLE CHASERS reader...the winner of Wizard: The Comic Magazine's "BATTLE CHASERS Create a Monster Contest!"
ComicInfo.Title: Dear Diary
